name: Armored Bitron
description: You can Tribute this card: Special Summon 1 Cyberse monster from your Deck, except "Armored Bitron", but negate its effects, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Cyberse monsters. If a Link-3 or higher Link Monster you control is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Armored Bitron" once per turn.
